name: Search Extension
tagline: Lets you search google from ScratchX!
body:
# Welcome to Search Extension by Mrcomputer1
[Use the extension](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://mrcomputer1extensions.github.io/SearchExtension/SearchExtension.js)

[Source Code](https://github.com/Mrcomputer1Extensions/SearchExtension/blob/gh-pages/SearchExtension.js)

[Report an issue](https://github.com/Mrcomputer1Extensions/SearchExtension/issues/new)

This extension uses [Google Search](https://www.google.com) to search for stuff!

# How to use

## Search %s result %n return %m
Search %s="Query" result %n="What result? 1 first, 8 last" return %m="Title, URL, Content"

Searches the internet using google

# How it works?

`
http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/services/search/web?v=1.0&q=(query)&rsz=1&start=(what result)&safe=active
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
